feedbackItems.utterance: When the pest arrives to a farm, it gets destroyed and that farmer loses the game.
The more farmers contribute to the collective, the lesser the probability of pest spreading.
The less farmers contribute to the collective, the more money they save on their wallets. This increases the probability of pest spreading.
Note that as farmers lose their crops there are less farmers to contribute to the collective. This increases the probability of pest spreading.
Note that if each farmer contributes 2GP per year, the risk of pest spreading will reduce to 33%.
The collective has gather on average {collectiveAVG}GP per year.
Each farmer has contributed {farmerContributionAVG}GP per year.
The less you contribute to the collective, the higher the risk of pest spreading.
